title: TOSAcceptanceMetadata
description: Metadata related to the acceptance of Terms of Service

agreement_accepted.description: Indicates whether the TOS agreement was accepted

originator_ip_address.description: The IP address of the originator when they accepted the TOS. Formatted as an IPv4 or IPv6 IP address

agreement_accepted_at.description: ISO8601 timestamp indicating when the originator accepted the TOS
